Views Documentation
===================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Overview
--------

This section provides documentation for the views used in the Obokash RoomRental application.

.. automodule:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :private-members:

.. autoclass:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.YourViewClass
   :members:
   :undoc-members:

.. autofunction:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.your_view_function
   :undoc-members:

Login View
----------

Handles user login requests.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.login_view

Search View
-----------

Handles search queries for houses and apartments.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.search

Register View
------------

Handles user registration requests.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.register

About View
----------

Displays information about the website.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.about

Home View
---------

Homepage view, providing the search functionality.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.home

Review View
-----------

Handles user reviews and contact requests.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.review

Recommendation View
-------------------

Renders the recommendation page.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.recommendation

Profile View
------------

User profile page, displaying user details, posted rooms, and houses.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.profile

Index View
----------

Home page, displaying a list of rooms and houses.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.index

Deleter View
------------

Deletes an apartment listing based on the provided ID and redirects to the user's profile page.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.deleter

Deleteh View
------------

Deletes a house listing based on the provided ID and redirects to the user's profile page.

.. automethod:: Obokash_RoomRental.Guest.views.deleteh
